title: Ranked Restrictions - Verbal Abuse - RIOT Please Listen
body:
So, anyone else have these problems?
I understand that I was once verbally abusive.. However now everyone understands that verbal abuse is about the only report that actually does anything... So when they think I play bad.. I get reported for verbal abuse.. When I take a position someone else wanted .. I get 4 verbal abuses.. 
An example.. I ping someone in game the other day.. I ping  them twice to back away from baron.. We don't want to do it.. He reports me for verbal abuse.. Im stuck with another 35 games of ranked restrict.. Fuck this dude. Riot Please

replies.body: False accounts don't count against you, so if players are reporting you, and you're not doing x, y or z that you've been reported for, you won't be punished. Also, please keep in mind that you may not be immediately punished for verbal abuse, etc. which means the punishment you receive (i.e chat restrictions) may be due to actions in previous games.

Also, please keep in mind that you may not be immediately punished for verbal abuse, etc. which means the punishment you receive (i.e chat restrictions) may be due to actions in previous games.

Thanks for the comment although I believe that having afk and verbal abuse be the only actual reports that do anything is just frustrating..unskilled should do the same thing as verbal abuse.. and why should verbal abuse ban you from ranked? Chat restrict makesure sense.. hell just ban them from talking altogether for 35 wins... doing ranked restrict just makes normal drafts less fun for others.. but unskilled does nothing however it should..

> [{quoted}](name=UE Graphic,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=828K1qAh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-13T02:38:27.299+0000)
>
> Thanks for the comment although I believe that having afk and verbal abuse be the only actual reports that do anything is just frustrating..

They're not...

> unskilled should do the same thing as verbal abuse..

Um, no.  Being unskilled isn't against the rules.  Verbally abusing people is.

> and why should verbal abuse ban you from ranked?

If you can't follow the rules, why should you be allowed to play?  Ranked is the highest stress game mode.  If you're a constant source of stress, you're a negative influence on the other players.  Breaking *any* rules should get your ability to access game modes revoked.

Never for an ounce of time would I ever try to top a Riot Comment. Placement concerns, so I did not piggy back on another persons comment with the same trains of thoughts. {List below is linear to help save space}

Unskilled/ Abusive Harassment/ Verbal Language/ Negative Attitude/ Unsportsmanlike

I also know when reporting I might have been perfect, so I might offer feedback about my game in a contrast report. At least there could be  comparison of evidence of the questionable behaviors to help with the review. Unless, they are solo, and their behaviors are Blatantly defining the need for me to adhere in accordance with the Summoner Code.

As a means with averages, maybe make a note of this occurrence being the (example 12th time this week, note)(then state the fact of the total amount you have calculated with your notes inside of reporting). Averages with frequency is a concern to address. Maybe possible for Riot to collect evidence of the frequency of the abusive behaviors; ~ in other words, the more reports which will flag you only in reporting conveys your officiating the specific report of questionable behavior for review when reporting out-of-bounds behaviors inside of League of Legends Games.
